```{r}
## Convert character columns to factors
housing <- as.data.frame(unclass(housing))
## Removing the data which has no year built
housing_naomit <- housing[!is.na(housing$GarageYrBlt), ]
```

-----------------------------------------------------------
Alvira



```{r}
grid.lambda <- 10^seq(10, -2, length = 100)
housing_imputed = na.omit(housing_naomit)
housing_imputed = housing_imputed[,c(-1,-10)]
X = model.matrix(SalePrice ~.,housing_imputed)[,-1]
y = housing_imputed$SalePrice

#10 Fold Validation Lasso Selection
train <- sample(1:nrow(X), nrow(X) / 2)
test <- (-train)
y.train <- y[train]
y.test <- y[test]
lasso.model.train <- glmnet(X[train, ], y.train, alpha = 1, lambda = grid.lambda)

cv.out <- cv.glmnet(X[train, ], y.train, alpha = 1)
best.lambda <- cv.out$lambda.min
plot(cv.out)
abline(v = log(best.lambda), col = "blue", lwd = 2)

lasso.model_best.lambda = glmnet(X[train, ], y.train, alpha = 1, lambda = best.lambda)
cf = coef(lasso.model_best.lambda)
index_nonzeroCoeff = which(cf!=0)
non_zeroCoef_names = cf@Dimnames[[1]][which(cf!=0)]
```


```{r}
ols_model <- lm(y ~ X)
cooksd <- cooks.distance(ols_model)
plot(cooksd, pch="*", cex=2, main="Influential Obs by Cooks distance")  # plot cook's distance
abline(h = 4*mean(cooksd, na.rm=T), col="red")  # add cutoff line
upper_limit_cooksd = 4*mean(cooksd, na.rm = T)
index_influential = which(cooksd > upper_limit_cooksd)
len_influentialn = length(index_influential)
housing_removed_influential = housing[-index_influential,]
```
